76e9d452-4ec7-4b80-9b4e-37d5cd8ce868.name: 40 points chosen from the following
76e9d452-4ec7-4b80-9b4e-37d5cd8ce868.notes: and/or raise Parapsychology to levels 3-4 or add additional Psionic Talents

c1c26ac9-806c-4752-9eb0-b9fca71a90a5.name: 特化
c1c26ac9-806c-4752-9eb0-b9fca71a90a5.notes: @一 纲生物（如“哺乳类”或“鸟类”）@

4f52f370-d004-492a-bf5a-9b1a677dfd8f.name: 特化
4f52f370-d004-492a-bf5a-9b1a677dfd8f.notes: @一科生物（如“猫科动物”或“鹦鹉科动物”）@

de98f76c-c38d-4474-b303-8a2636523135.name: 特化
de98f76c-c38d-4474-b303-8a2636523135.notes: @一种生物（如“家猫”或“金刚鹦鹉”）@

38f19cfe-eb4e-4da8-a899-4dfc2162293a.name: Destiny
38f19cfe-eb4e-4da8-a899-4dfc2162293a.notes: Start the game with (level) Destiny points, used as if bonus character points

5e750516-c35b-41d5-8b27-2e12fda1b7f5.name: Equipment Bond (@Item@)
5e750516-c35b-41d5-8b27-2e12fda1b7f5.notes: You have a tool particularly suited to you for +1 to skill rolls using it.

6a474f62-d6f6-4dd7-b5dd-423da69490de.name: 高痛阈
6a474f62-d6f6-4dd7-b5dd-423da69490de.notes: Never suffer shock penalties when injured; +3 on all HT rolls to avoid knockdown and stunning; +3 to resist torture

31d89001-ce1a-4082-a2fd-845eb553c9ca.name: Luck, Extraordinary
31d89001-ce1a-4082-a2fd-845eb553c9ca.notes: Usable once per 30 minutes of play (replaces Luck)

8a321715-43c4-40eb-8dcd-fce9f6394f1f.name: @谁：点数为 PC 起始点数的 150% 的个人@

db4b6f44-3db8-4f63-b7ea-c1ee7ab0851e.name: @谁：拥有价值 1000 倍这个世界的起始财产的资产的组织@

d2dd9bd6-5692-4791-8dcf-d43bea4c9aba.name: @谁：点数为 PC 起始点数的 200% 的个人@

339e777c-6df3-4c07-a3cb-d105fac37b8b.name: @谁：拥有价值 10000 倍这个世界的起始财产的资产的组织@

417c9e6c-3f47-423f-bb81-d44fbcf35c3e.name: @谁：拥有价值 100000 倍这个世界的起始财产的资产的组织@

bd2b01d6-3381-43df-8c50-0e0321f92966.name: @谁：拥有价值 1000000 倍这个世界的起始财产的资产的组织@

35f87181-6d28-4f53-973f-9c243019036a.name: @谁：国家政府或是巨型跨国组织@

5c735c54-ba0c-4cc7-8d60-b78b9b8b83d4.name: Equipment
5c735c54-ba0c-4cc7-8d60-b78b9b8b83d4.notes: @装备的价值不会超过起始财富@

b929630d-eadb-4b45-8107-d8f036298eeb.name: Equipment
b929630d-eadb-4b45-8107-d8f036298eeb.notes: @装备的价值能够超过起始财富@

c608fdf1-7180-4813-ac0c-ed3ab7052c08.name: 特殊能力
c608fdf1-7180-4813-ac0c-ed3ab7052c08.notes: @在非魔法世界有魔法力量、拥有来自未来 TL 的装备、给予你特殊能力@

9dd20a23-e675-412d-b4ad-f454f4ccfe4d.name: Quick Reload (@Specialization@)
9dd20a23-e675-412d-b4ad-f454f4ccfe4d.notes: Must specialize in either Magazine, Revolver, or Gun!

e6b03166-a67f-47e0-bb6b-1718791e6d3e.name: 慢速
e6b03166-a67f-47e0-bb6b-1718791e6d3e.notes: 你每 12 小时额外恢复 1 HP

ed8dd199-c00b-468a-9126-8e53d5a22511.name: 常规
ed8dd199-c00b-468a-9126-8e53d5a22511.notes: 你每 1 小时额外恢复 1 HP

683c64e2-6238-491a-997c-656a4b992fe1.name: 快速
683c64e2-6238-491a-997c-656a4b992fe1.notes: 你每 1 分钟额外恢复 1 HP

808103aa-345f-48fd-ba84-b198f0d7be64.name: 高速
808103aa-345f-48fd-ba84-b198f0d7be64.notes: 你每 1 秒额外恢复 1 HP

05018d0a-82c4-4de6-b5ab-d5bd15143fe3.name: 极度
05018d0a-82c4-4de6-b5ab-d5bd15143fe3.notes: 你每 1 秒额外恢复 10 HP

597947a8-405b-4a3e-8f95-f52c8b1abd62.name: @罕见：加速度，高原反应，潜水病，晕船，或是太空病等@

0c097ef4-3afa-4f28-9b2b-0056961b2917.name: 标志性装备
0c097ef4-3afa-4f28-9b2b-0056961b2917.notes: Gear is worth (starting wealth)/10 per level

3d770f8d-0f06-448c-a592-bd9a75dfe158.name: 战斗反射
3d770f8d-0f06-448c-a592-bd9a75dfe158.notes: Never freeze; +6 on all IQ rolls to wake up or to recover from surprise or mental stun; Your side gets +1 to initiative rolls (+2 if you're the leader)

bafab76e-0a57-4aa6-87ac-a26bb3fcd0a1.name: 幸运
bafab76e-0a57-4aa6-87ac-a26bb3fcd0a1.notes: 游戏的每个小时可用一次

f280f200-1eb4-410d-b2ae-79bf524ca046.name: Parapsychologist
f280f200-1eb4-410d-b2ae-79bf524ca046.notes: Reaction bonus: psis and true believers

002f59c8-a812-4d7d-882f-24933e837fe9.name: Psionic Powers
002f59c8-a812-4d7d-882f-24933e837fe9.notes: 100 points (put any remainders into other Advantages)

0fa44e25-6fdc-4a1c-9c05-f73f18c78b75.name: Use Mind Reading and/or Mind Probe

a020c096-d0ca-4766-b85f-7cbd253f85d6.name: 视力不良（远视）
a020c096-d0ca-4766-b85f-7cbd253f85d6.notes: -6 to Vision rolls to spot items within 1 yd; -3 DX to any close manual task, including close combat

c4b90a3a-c28b-46a6-babb-321283c24b19.name: 视力不良（近视）
c4b90a3a-c28b-46a6-babb-321283c24b19.notes: -6 to Vision rolls to spot items more than 1 yd away; -2 to all melee attacks; double actual distance to the target when calculating the range modifier for ranged attacks

adf874ba-e2db-40ff-9a01-1cb4bae48cf4.name: 邪恶双生子
adf874ba-e2db-40ff-9a01-1cb4bae48cf4.notes: 在你拥有的能力上更加强大或拥有你没有的能力

f1437ee1-0f83-4eee-939e-d6c7de38d2be.name: 邪恶双生子
f1437ee1-0f83-4eee-939e-d6c7de38d2be.notes: 在你拥有的能力上更加强大且拥有你没有的能力

d32a224f-b5f3-4e85-8557-4ecb547dfed9.name: Withdrawal
d32a224f-b5f3-4e85-8557-4ecb547dfed9.notes: -5 to all psi rolls while going through withdrawal

a5055e10-58d3-4b06-b141-7dcfcfb7b36b.name: 期待陪伴
a5055e10-58d3-4b06-b141-7dcfcfb7b36b.notes: React to others at +2; -1 to IQ-based skills when alone

9e35f7b7-021d-49ed-817b-cadb88ded32b.name: Chummy (Gregarious)
9e35f7b7-021d-49ed-817b-cadb88ded32b.notes: React to others at +4; -2 to IQ-based skills when alone, or -1 in a group of 4 or less

1272da4b-f03d-4a81-9b07-314cab4a42e5.name: Delusion (I can solve any problem with psi!)

448e3987-c8d3-4823-8bf1-00f72d7ee798.name: Three of the following
448e3987-c8d3-4823-8bf1-00f72d7ee798.notes: or raise one of these by one level (6 pts total)

3f8ae255-c0ac-4d54-a3d1-0318763beee5.text:
Psi
Some people say brains aren’t everything, but theirs can’t
 do the nifty stuff that yours can! You are a master of mind
 over matter, with abilities potentially ranging from
 information gathering to instantaneous movement. While
 the techie (pp. 18-19) shares some of your skills and the
 experiment (p. 11) shares your attitude, neither has a mind
 as versatile as yours. Oh sure, you may not be as
 physically buff as some of your teammates, but there’s
 more to life than swinging a battleaxe. All you need is your
 brain (and a few good guns – you know, just in case!) to
 investigate, hunt, and wipe out any threat.
